title: [BUG] [Windows] [Docker] `DllNotFoundException` on Docker with Windows container
body:
**Description**

I'm using `mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:6.0` as runtime Docker image.

Related issue for Linux: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/1341

I wanted to install SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.*, but there are only 32 bit version for Windows... (and installing it doesn't fix the problem)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/905878/231474684-6745dd8a-7d38-4116-90a7-84f0921deef3.png)

**Expected Behavior**

SkiaSharp is copying its DLL without manually doing anything in Dockerfile.

**Actual Behavior**

```
System.DllNotFoundException:
Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies: The specified module could not be found. (0x8007007E)
at SkiaSharp.SkiaApi.sk_path_new()
at SkiaSharp.SKPath..ctor()
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: `mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:6.0` built on Azure DevOps in Windows containers
